title: DDFP 515: Week 14 recap & Are we sleeping on the Falcons?
itunes:title: DDFP 515: Week 14 recap & Are we sleeping on the Falcons?
description:
Shek is joined by Ike Taylor and Maurice Jones-Drew to discuss Odell Beckham's celebrations, whether or not we're sleeping on the Falcons and if Harry Douglas' hit on Chris Harris Jr. was dirty. Also, the fellas discuss the best wins and worst losses from Week 14, highlighting the Chiefs' win and the Rams' loss. Then, Ike reveals Jeff Fisher as his Week 14 "Escape Goat" and the guys discuss potential new head coaches for the Rams. Plus, the fellas determine whether or not it's too early for fans of the Steelers, Bucs and Lions to start celebrating the postseason based on their remaining 2016 schedules.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
